All providers support native video analysis - no frame extraction needed!

cameras.description:
Configure your cameras. Format: name:channel:friendly_name (one per line)

Example:
driveway:05:Driveway
porch:03:Front Porch

Configure notification services for iOS and Android devices.

**Important:** Specify iOS devices separately for proper image attachments.
